alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 01 at 9:37PM EDT until October 04 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Fisheating Creek near Palmdale affecting Glades County. For the Lake Okeechobee/Fisheating Creek...including Ortona Lock, 12 midnight avg lake lvl, Moore Haven Lock, Fisheating Creek near Lakeport at Highway 78, Clewiston Ind. Canal, Palmdale...Minor Flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Fisheating Creek near Palmdale. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Fisheating creek is going into flood stage. Access road to campground and the bath house are still Flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.2 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.9 feet on 09/12/1940. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 945 AM EDT.
